div.p: Phanias, Heraclas, and Diogenes alias Hermaeus, officials in charge of the katalochismoi registers, to the agoranomi, greetings. Theon, son of Demetrius, son of Sarapion, has had ceded to him by Nicarion, daughter of Diogenes, son of Zoilus, with her husband Sarapion, son of Phanias, as guardian, in accordance with the contract executed through the notarial office (mnemoneion) in the same city, in the present month Neos Sebastos, the (n arouras) belonging to her around Toou ...
